title: Bug 114903 - Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing a report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the expected behavior is that the default values should be displayed in the value box. This allows users to easily modify the parameter they want to change. However, the actual behavior is that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty. This requires users to input all values even if they only want to modify one parameter.
OB: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the 'Enter Parameters' dialog opens. However, all the values in the dialog are empty.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the 'Enter Parameters' dialog should open with the default values displayed in the value box. This allows users to modify the desired parameter without having to input all values.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Preview the report.
3. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
4. Observe that the 'Enter Parameters' dialog opens with all the values empty.
